quote: It's the child who's supposed to cry, and the mom who makes it all better, not the other way around, which is why mothers will move heaven and earth to hold it together in front of their own kids.
quote_letters: ITS THE CHILD WHOS SUPPOSED TO CRY AND THE MOM WHO MAKES IT ALL BETTER NOT THE OTHER WAY AROUND WHICH IS WHY MOTHERS WILL MOVE HEAVEN AND EARTH TO HOLD IT TOGETHER IN FRONT OF THEIR OWN KIDS
